query: SELECT name, totalAssets, CONCAT('$', FORMAT(totalAssets, 0), 'M') as formatted FROM commercial_banks ORDER BY totalAssets DESC LIMIT 5;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4DB9hJWqLzCzJpD.4ae2ba9639dc --database XodoyKMzPdFiKkVj3QFTGK --execute SELECT name, totalAssets, CONCAT('$', FORMAT(totalAssets, 0), 'M') as formatted FROM commercial_banks ORDER BY totalAssets DESC LIMIT 5;
